originalText.text: Best in the community. Drop off service is of great quality- great price, always laundry well taken care & nicely folded, organized, kind & helpful staff. Owner Sherry is kind, responsible, professional & respectful. Her honesty & humility makes you feel welcomed. Thank You So Much Sherry--always with a smile & as you take care of our laundry personally-even late on a Sunday-you help us so much.

originalText.text: I am so happy with this place, I recommend my neighbors to go wash there.

text.text: I am so happy with this place, I recommend my neighbors to go wash there.

originalText.text: Best drop off service ever experienced in city and great prices. Laundry gem. Huge laundromat to wash your own clothes with well maintained high quality machines. Excellent staff.

text.text: Best drop off service ever experienced in city and great prices. Laundry gem. Huge laundromat to wash your own clothes with well maintained high quality machines. Excellent staff.

originalText.text: Bcz of personal reasons I didn’t visit the laundry till this time when I found out that my laundry card didn’t work; then the guy working there told that was the wrong card. I was told there were changes he could find out the money left in my card and tried to fix it up in a new card, finally said system was not working. What it happened is that is not the same people running the biz; I really didn’t lost to much credit in the old; but what if I have trusted this annoying laundry cards and left a considerable amount?? Someone got to do something about it

originalText.text: This is by far the best laundromat in the area. I always come at night time because it is 24/7. The drop-off service are also excellent and I never had any issues with anything. It is also super clean and very well maintained with plenty of machines and folding areas for the customer. Very good!!
